00019 #include "defines.h"
00020 
00021 
00022 void initbootuart(void)
00023 {
00024   BAUD_RATE_LOW_REG = BRREG_VALUE;
00025   UART_CONTROL_REG = (1 << ENABLE_RECEIVER_BIT) |
00026                      (1 << ENABLE_TRANSMITTER_BIT); // enable receive and transmit 
00027 }
00028 
00029 
00030 void sendchar(unsigned char c)
00031 {
00032   UART_DATA_REG = c;                                   // prepare transmission
00033   while (!(UART_STATUS_REG & (1 << TRANSMIT_COMPLETE_BIT)));// wait until sent
00034   UART_STATUS_REG |= (1 << TRANSMIT_COMPLETE_BIT);          // delete TXCflag
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 unsigned char recchar(void)
00039 {
00040   while(!(UART_STATUS_REG & (1 << RECEIVE_COMPLETE_BIT)));  // wait for data
00041   return UART_DATA_REG;
00042 }
